title: Colorado Avalanche scored one goal in final five exhibition games
text:
Published By: Denver Post Avalanche - Today 
Defenseman Tyson Barrie scored the only goal in those five games, and it came in a 2-1 shootout loss to the Los Angeles Kings at the Pepsi C...
